preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 160 g of iron powder using a precision scale.
2. Measure 40 g of phosphorus, ensuring it is in a suitable form (preferably white phosphorus for reactivity).
3. Weigh 120 g of vanadium powder.
4. Weigh 40 g of tungsten powder.
5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container.
6. Use a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to ensure uniform blending of the powders for at least 10 minutes.
